name: Mask On! (ThiaguiRulo)
description:
In Mask On! you will have to avoid the people who come close to you while increasing your score. Take close attention to PowerUps and coins, they will come in handy! Try to surpass your competitors in the Leaderboards and Have Fun!

Mask On! is a mobile game prototype currently in development. For the time being, it's only available for Android Devices and in English. Please leave a comment with your opinions. Thank you!
